name: iCloud for Windows 11.4
available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted tiff file may lead to a denial-of-service or potentially disclose memory contents
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant-Financial Light-Year Security Lab

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to a cross site scripting attack
advisories.description: An input validation issue was addressed with improved input validation.
